title: Woman in the Shadows (1934, Crime) Directed by Phil Rosen | with Fay Wray | 4K Colorized Movie

sources.title: Woman in the Shadows (1934, Crime) Directed by Phil Rosen | with Fay Wray | 4K Colorized Movie
sources.description:
John Bradley an ex-con plans to seek solitude in a remote cabin, but his peaceful isolation is shattered when Louise Loring, a woman fleeing her dangerous ex-lover, seeks refuge with him. As their romance blossoms, her vengeful ex-lover Tony Robson and his sidekick hunt them down. As Robson's pursuit intensifies, Bradley's past catches up with him, leading to a chain of events that propel him and Louise into a dangerous game of cat and mouse. With the law in pursuit and a treacherous plot unfolding, Bradley and Louise must rely on each other to confront their pasts and secure their future in a dramatic showdown that exposes the truth and delivers justice.

Black & White version: https://youtu.be/1WK8SCFoLf8


Original title: Woman in the Dark (1934) AKA: Woman in the Shadows
This film is subtitled in many languages.

Director: Phil Rosen
Writers: Dashiell Hammett, Sada Cowan, Charles Williams
Stars: Fay Wray, Ralph Bellamy, Melvyn Douglas, Roscoe Ates
Genres: Colorized, Crime, Drama, Film Noir, Literary


00:00 Full Movie (with subtitles) 
02:44 A released prisoner John Bradley, faces challenges and judgment from his community, while a woman stirs up gossip.
08:51 Drama unfolds as Louise Loring seeks refuge at a stranger's house, sparking tension and revealing hidden motives.
19:50 A woman faces manipulation and danger from a criminal, leading to a tense confrontation.
24:00 A woman helps a man escape from the police after a violent incident, leading to a dangerous situation.
30:45 A woman seeks help from an old friend while on the run, leading to unexpected encounters and a potential conflict with the law.
39:05 A woman helps a man escape from the police and faces consequences for possessing stolen jewelry.
48:52 A woman seeks help from her lawyer friend after being implicated in a theft case involving her ex-partner.
54:21 A woman learns about a murder charge and plans an escape with her husband from a dangerous situation.
1:01:41 Drama unfolds as secrets are revealed during a police investigation at a house.
